issue.title: [GLib] Extend gparquet API with get_schema and read_column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3474](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3474). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So we can read individual columns without loading the whole parquet file in memory, we need to surface the getSchema and ReadColumn functions of parquet-cpp to the parquet glib API.
